FROM ubuntu:20.04

# use a common app path, copied from python-onbuild:latest
ENV WORKDIR /usr/src/app
RUN mkdir -p ${WORKDIR}
WORKDIR ${WORKDIR}

# install dependencies
RUN apt-get update \
    && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
        curl \
    && curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x -o nodesource_setup.sh \
    && bash nodesource_setup.sh \
    && DEBIAN_FRONTEND="noninteractive" apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y \
        build-essential \
        git \
        openjdk-8-jdk \
        openjdk-11-jdk \
        maven \
        nodejs \
        rpm \
        ruby-dev \
    && mvn --version \
    && gem install fpm \
    && npm install -g bower && npm cache clean --force; && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR ${WORKDIR}

# Add entrypoint script
COPY src/packaging/docker-build/docker-entrypoint.sh ${WORKDIR}
ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/src/app/docker-entrypoint.sh"]
CMD [""]
